casebody.data:
Fisher, et al
v.
Flue-Cured Tobacco Cooperative Stabilization Corporation 374A14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 20, 2016.

Mr. Donald H. Tucker, Jr., Hon. K. Edward Greene, Mr. Tobias S. Hampson, Mr. Derek L. Shaffer, Mr. Jon Corey, Mr. John B. Quinn, Attorneys at Law, For Flue-Cured Tobacco Cooperative Stabilization Corporation (n/k/a United States Tobacco Cooperative, Inc.).

Mr. Jackson Wyatt Moore, Jr., Mr. J. Mitchell Armbruster, Mr. A.G. Solomons, III, Mr. Paul J. Ekster, Mr. Terrry E. Richardson, Jr., Mr. Lee M. Whitman, Quinn Emanuel, Attorneys at Law.

Mr. Philip R. Isley, Mr. Lonnie B. Williams, Mr. William Robert Cherry, Jr., Mr. C. Alan Runyan, Mr. Dennis T. Worley, Mr. James L. Ward, Jr., Mr. Charles H. Williams, Attorneys at Law, For Fisher, Kaye W. et al.

Mr. John R. Wester, Attorney at Law, For North Carolina Chamber.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of April 2015 by *527Defendant for Leave to Respond to Memorandum of Additional Authority:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of December 2016."
